summary.para: Deprecated. Adds a new entry for a pending navigation to the travel log.

param.name: punk
param.para: A pointer to an representing the nearest browser or frame within which the travel generating the log is taking place.

param.name: fIsLocalAnchor
param.para: A value specifying whether the new entry is a local anchor.
The entry is an anchor link within the same page.
The entry is another page or an anchor on another page.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Deprecated. Duplicates the contents of the current travel log.

param.name: pptl
param.para: The address of a pointer to the interface representing the cloned travel log.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Deprecated. Generates the number of entries in the travel log.

param.name: punk
param.para: A pointer to an representing the nearest browser or frame within which the travel generating the log is taking place.

returns.para: Type: DWORD
The number of entries in the travel log.

summary.para: Deprecated. Determines whether a specific travel entry is present in the travel log.

param.name: punk
param.para: A pointer to an representing the nearest browser or frame within which the travel generating the log is taking place.

param.name: pidl
param.para: A PIDL of the travel entry, typically obtained through .

param.name: ppte
param.para: The address of a pointer to the interface representing the travel entry, if found.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Deprecated. Gets tooltip text for a travel entry, which is used as a Unicode display string in the UI.

param.name: punk
param.para: A pointer to an representing the nearest browser or frame within which the travel generating the log is taking place.

param.name: iOffset
param.para: The number of travel entries forward (a positive value) or backward (a negative value) to move in the travel log to arrive at the travel entry from which text should be retrieved.

param.name: pwzText
param.para: A pointer to a buffer that receives the Unicode tooltip text string.

param.name: cchText
param.para: The number of characters in the buffer pointed to by pwzText.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Deprecated. Gets a travel entry in the travel log relative to the position of the current entry.

param.name: punk
param.para: A pointer to an representing the nearest browser or frame within which the travel generating the log is taking place.

param.name: iOffset
param.para: The number of travel entries forward (a positive value) or backward (a negative value) to move in the travel log.

param.name: ppte
param.para: The address of a pointer to the interface representing the travel entry at the offset specified in iOffset. This value is only valid if the method returns successfully.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: ITravelLog.GetTravelEntry is often used to discover whether the Back and Forward buttons should be enabled in the browser window.

summary.para: Deprecated. Inserts entries into the specified menu.

param.name: punk
param.para: A pointer to an representing the nearest browser or frame within which the travel generating the log is taking place.

param.name: nPos
param.para: The position in the menu to insert the entries.

param.name: idFirst
param.para: The ID of the first entry to be inserted.

param.name: idLast
param.para: The ID of the last entry to be inserted. The difference between idFirst and idLast is the maximum number of entries that can be inserted into the menu.

param.name: dwFlags
param.para: The types of entries to add to the menu. Includes the following:
Add a check mark next to the entry of the current page.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Deprecated. Reverts to the current entry, dropping the result of in the case of a failed navigation.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Deprecated. Navigates to a travel entry in the travel log relative to the position of the current entry.

param.name: punk
param.para: A pointer to an that represents the nearest browser or frame within which the travel generating the log is taking place.

param.name: iOffset
param.para: The number of travel entries forward (a positive value) or backward (a negative value) to move in the travel log.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: Calling ITravelLog.Travel has the same result as calling .

summary.para: Deprecated. Saves the browser state of the current entry in preparation for a pending navigation.

param.name: punk
param.para: A pointer to an that represents the nearest browser or frame within which the travel generating the log is taking place.

param.name: fIsLocalAnchor
param.para: A value specifying whether the new entry is a local anchor.
The entry is an anchor link within the same page.
The entry is another page or an anchor on another page.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Deprecated. Updates an entry that originated out of the current procedure through IHlinkFrame.

param.name: punk
param.para: A pointer to an representing the nearest browser or frame within which the travel generating the log is taking place.

param.name: punkHLBrowseContext
param.para: A pointer to the of an IHlinkBrowseContext retrieved through IHlinkFrame.GetBrowseContext.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
